## Project Overview

A Ruby on Rails application using MongoDB for managing user subscriptions, purchases, and promotions.

## Stack
- Ruby on Rails (API + Views)
- MongoDB (via Mongoid)
- Devise (Authentication)
- ActionMailer (Email notifications)

## Models
- User (with roles: admin, user)
- UserSubscription
- UserPurchaseHistory
- Promotion
